title: Resolution Crashes
body: I recently switched to a new monitor for league of legends and the game crashes whenever I attempt to get in game. My resolution hasn't yet been set to the new monitor's, so it crashes whenever i enter a game. The problem is, I can't change the resolution and video settings without being in a game, and i obviously can't get there. HELP!!!!

replies.body:
Ah, this is a pretty silly situation that sometimes occurs when you switch displays. You should be able to resolve this by resetting your input file with the steps below:

First, you'll want to **log into the game** then hop into your config folder, which should be in your install directory:

> **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

Delete these two files:
**- input.ini
- PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted these two files, hop into a custom match to confirm the change went through. Let me know if this worked!
Thank you for the assisstance - it helped!
